system.description:
A Bard can climb walls, cliffs, and other vertical surfaces with the same chance as a Thief of the same level. The Bard must have both hands free and cannot climb while holding a weapon or instrument. Climbing takes one round per 10 feet and failure means slipping at the halfway point, with a chance to catch themselves if the DM allows.

Armor Penalties:

  • Scale Mail: –15%
  • Chain Mail: –20% (–10% if Elven Chain)
  • Shield Worn: Additional –5% (if slung on the back)
